titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony by an employee of the Senate and to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/15/1994--Introduced. Authorizes Mary Leblanc, a Senate employee, to testify in conjunction with law enforcement investigations or related proceedings, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted, and authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent her.
